name: bamacbatful
text: Friendly and efficient.  If you have to take a test, this is a great place to do it.  On the hill behind Sammy's.

name: Michael Peterson
text: Terrible experience - Highly recommend you do not choose this testing location until a change in management is taken.

name: Susan Clark
text: Closed on test day with no notice! Left a phone number on the door arhat no one ever answers. On hold  for 45 minutes. After you study and plan, this is unacceptable.

name: Casey Marshall
text: Staff is unfriendly and cold. I started my exam an hour late due to the quantity of test takers. I was interrupted three times during my exam because my mask was apparently not up to my eyeballs. This occurred while I was sitting at my computer with dividers in between other test takers. Choose a different company/location.

name: Wendy Hudson
text: The staff is always so supportive when I have been to take my CPA test!  Clean and well organized

name: Elena Louie
text: The staff is awesome! Very friendly and helpful. The testing area is clean, quiet and conducive to taking long tests. Will come back if I have to test again.

name: Celayna Clark
text: Great location easy to find and friendly workers

name: Taylor Tanner
text: This place can be a bit chilly. They are mandated to keep the temperature between 70° to 74° F. I recommend a light sweater/jacket. Also the instructions state tp be there 30 minutes early to allow time to check in but I recommend showing up at least 45 minutes to 1 hour early to insure you are able to start on time

name: Morgan Marlow
text: Staff is friendly and helped me calm my nerves before my test. Facility is nice and has a good break area too.

name: Christopher Mcdonald
text: Well done

name: Lee Nickels
text: This place is ok. They have a lot of people coming through there daily. The 2 people that were there weren't overly friendly, especially the guy checking you in. Overall below average to average experience. The center itself is pretty nice.

name: J T
text: I'm not sure if they make it cold and uncomfortable and act indifferent towards you on purpose but it didn't help my test taking anxiety. I hope I never have to go here again.

name: J T
text: I'm not sure if they make it cold and uncomfortable and act indifferent towards you on purpose but it didn't help my test taking anxiety. I hope I never have to go here again.

name: William Finney Jr
text: The new location is much nicer than the previous location and the new chairs are more comfortable than the old chairs.  Overall it's not bad outside of the solid 30 min drive to get there. But, it can't compare to the Pearson VUE location in the Carmichael Center, so I have to give it 4 instead of 5 stars.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback. It is much appreciated.

name: Nicholas Friday
text: I could not recommend this facility more! Mrs. Marietta and her team are some of the kindest and knowledgeable people I have come in contact with. I have taken a significant number of college level exams in their facilities and with the quality of the furniture and equipment it does not get much better. I enjoyed using the Exam Center's facility so thoroughly in college that I came back for my insurance licensing exam. If possible, I would never take an exam at another facility because of the top-notch equipment and the character of these people.

resp.text: Thank you Nicholas. Your feedback and  kind words are appreciated. I am very fortunate that I had the opportunity to get to know you. I hope you visit every now and then and let us know how you are doing. Wishing you much success in all your endeavors.

name: Brandon Wheeler
text: I have now taken 8 certification exams at this testing center. It is the most professional, and painless testing center that you could go to. This area is very lucky to have a place like this, considering how rural it is. Couldn't recommend it enough!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the feedback Brandon. We strive to provide each tester with the best possible testing experience while upholding exam security.

name: Joshua Osborne-Price
text: Very Friendly Staff and helpful. The experience testing at this site was a great one and very clean and comfortable. .....

name: Matt Means
text: Open on Saturdays for working folks.  Testing center is very comfortable and the desks and chairs are perfect for maintaining good posture to allow you the focus you need to pass your exam.  The testing computers were new, and they even made noise cancelling headphones available.

resp.text: Thank you Matt. We appreciate the positive feedback. We strive to make everyone's testing experience as stress free as possible.

name: Jay Dorminey
text: This place always provides a nice clean environment to test in, there is fine road noise, but they provided noise cancelling head sets. The staff is very friendly.
